item.description:
Feb. 16-Mar. 8, 2012
7:15-10:00 pm

Classes will run for 4 consecutive Thursday nights beginning
February 16, and will run from 7:15 pm till 10:00 pm.
Feb. 16 at St. Michael Parish, 90 Concord Road Bedford, Mass.
All other sessions at Temple Emunah, 9 Piper Road Lexington, Mass.

Classes will be taught by Steve Tramack, one of the top vocal
instructors in the Northeast. Topics will include breath support,
resonance and vowel matching. Ability to read music is not
required--voice part learning CD’s are provided.

 

If you are in need of a means to get to the rehearsal location, we can arrange rides from Alewife, Riverside or other major T stations.

 

 

Lesson materials are $15 if you wish to keep them.

 

For more details
call David at
(866) 537-1584
lessons@soundsofconcord.org

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: *Free Voice Lessons for Men* (Sponsored by Sounds of Concord)
